entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -36.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 12:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -36.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -39.6°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Clear. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
